raccoonAttacks.string: You come accross a pack of ravenous raccoons. What do you want to do?
You start running through the streets as fast as you can.  Terror grips you and you trip over a rock.  Turnning around you see the pack of raccoons decend upon you..
The Raccoon approaches - he may have rabies...
You find a broken beer bottle and smash it into the face of the nearest raccoon.
You start singing a sweet melody and the raccoons slow back away
The sound of you crying infuriates the raccoon and they attack with intesity. Your are killed and eaten by raccoons
Despite you best effort you are overtaken by feroucious racconns.  You are dead
